text: 26:18 Aisaia 35:5; 42:7; 42:16; Jon 8:12; Aposel 20:32; 2 Korin 6:14; Efesus 2:2; Kolosi 1:13eghtɨ nɨ men damaziba kuightɨma, me akɨrim ragh mɨtatemɨn arazir kurabagh asaragh, angazangarimɨn izɨ. Egh me Satanɨn atrivir gavgavim ateghɨva, God bagh izɨ. Kamaghɨn kɨ men arazir kuraba gɨn amangtɨ, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itir gumazamizibar tongɨn danganim iniam. Nan gumazamizir kaba, me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan itima, kɨ me gamizɨ me zue. Nɨ ingangarir kam damuasa, kɨ me bagha nɨ amadi.’ ”
